item7: Management’s Discussion Analysis Financial Condition Results Operations
item2: See “Non-GAAP Financial Measures” included Item 2 reconciliation non-GAAP measures most comparable GAAP measure. Net sales increased $131 million, 6.0%, $2,313 million during three months ended September 30, 2025, compared $2,182 million during same period 2024. Net sales increased $119 million, 5.9%, $2,128 million, compared $2,009 million third quarter 2024 due higher volume related acquired business ($90 million) higher containerboard corrugated products prices mix ($87 million), partially offset lower legacy volume ($58 million). third quarter 2025, export domestic containerboard outside shipments decreased (15.5%) compared third quarter 2024.
